name: Watch
Cate
Le
Bon’s
stunning
new
video
for
‘Daylight
Matters’
content:
It's taken from her new album, 'Reward'Cate Le Bon has unveiled the video for her song, ‘Daylight Matters’. Watch it here first on NME.com.The Casey Raymond-directed video is filmed on the Welsh coastline with Le Bon wandering around in a bright red anorak. As described by Le Bon, the video represents “playful solitary despair in an alien landscape of sinking sand and towers in the sea. Searching or running away? A little bit of both, maybe.”
‘Daylight Matters’ is taken from Le Bon’s fifth studio album ‘Reward’, which drops on May 24.
